title: Historic Downtown
description: Explore charming shops, old architecture, and local cafes in the heart of the town.

title: City Park
description: Enjoy family fun, walking trails, and events in our beautiful central park.

title: Art Walk
description: Take a self-guided tour of murals, sculptures, and galleries scattered through the city.

title: Local Eats
description: Taste your way through diverse restaurants, food trucks, and farmer’s markets.

title: Community Theater
description: Catch a play, musical, or comedy night at the local performing arts center.

title: Lake Adventure
description: Kayak, fish, or relax by the water at our nearby scenic lake.

title: Annual Festival
description: Celebrate with live music, crafts, and food each summer at our city’s biggest festival.

title: Farm Visits
description: Get a hands-on farm experience with seasonal events and tours.
